system.description:
You know what materials can be repurposed to quickly synthesize a wide variety of medicine, drugs, and other healthcare needs. Over the course of 1 minute, you can create one of the following items:

  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.1DKr34clzbStJvrd]{Antiseptic} (1 use)
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.gn6AiTHVbdNWiJSj]{Immune Booster}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.7v5543efYNUZZhBX]{Anti-G Cocktail}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.u0W9ri3ZmI3WfufD]{Quick-Sober Patch}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.Yek7jR9xSah5Mnjj]{Anti-Inhibitor}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.Uj4Wvr0fuIW0En8q]{Anti-Rad}
  • Anxiety Medication
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.ntNFEwVuz54biCXZ]{Earplugs}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.dfqYQGaHs2FzKweI]{First Aid Kit} (1 use)
  • Focusing Agent
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.b3XzVl6r9JQ92j8z]{Reflex Enhancer}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.Gi4H8xR9JKO57jEc]{Smelling Salts}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.eQ2XqDOmJAWbyonE]{Steroid}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.c4W0B2sKGjtN6E3U]{Stimulant}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.EMsQ2vRgLsz8Tpqf]{Universal Airhypo}

At 4th level, you can also make nano-bandage, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.GJJo34RBmI3JWDOs]{Gullibility Serum}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.prdCCsdrO7rBLlTw]{Truth Serum (VRC)}, and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.3iqpP9Lp5PGHQp2n]{Styx}. At 6th level, you can also make @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.S9pGHdLAZ1uF0A8b]{Synthetic Adrenaline}.

Items produced in this way lose effectiveness after 1 hour. You can use this feature to create a number of items equal to your proficiency bonus and regain all expended uses when you finish a short or long rest.
